---
title: Publishing
---

There are several ways to publish Inspect Viz content, ranging from PNG images suitable for embedding in documents all the way up to notebooks, websites, and dashboards.

|  |  |
|-------------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| [Plots](publishing-plots.qmd) | Publish single plots as PNG images or HTML snippets. |
| [Output Format](publishing-output-format.qmd) | Configure the default output format for plots (e.g. to render all plots as PNG images). |
| [Notebooks](publishing-notebooks.qmd) | Publish collections of plots and tables as a notebook. |
| [Websites](publishing-websites.qmd) | Embed plots and tables in a larger website. |
| [Dashboards](publishing-dashboards.qmd) | Create a dashboard to provide easy navigation of collections of plots. |
